<NEW>

The fir=
st response was over from Wheelie as his transponder would locate him outsi=
de of the Ark, a few kilometers away over from the Maximal base of opreatio=
ns where it had landed, just on his way driving along.

There was a silent =
chirp in response to the summons, and the pingof his transponder turning th=
en as Wheelie wheeled around, and then went back over towards the ship.  Ho=
wever, due to his distance and the fact he would have to backtrack and then=
 come back aboard teh ship, it would take him at least two or three breems =
(about 15-20 minutes) to arrive back and report in, if LEO PRIME wished to =
see each instigator of the fight one on one, it might allow him to do this.=
